com.cafebabe.core.instructions

Class InstructionTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafebabe.core.instructions.InstructionTools

  • public class InstructionTools
extends java.lang.Object
    InstructionTools contains methods related to the workflow to translate a list of instructions, essentially to run through instructions of a method and sort them into families (meta instructions). This class keep information about the virtual topStack value.
    Author:
    Laffineur Gerome

      • translateArgs

        public static java.lang.String translateArgs(org.apache.bcel.generic.Type[] types)

      • translateIns

        public static java.lang.String translateIns(org.apache.bcel.generic.Instruction ins,
                                            org.apache.bcel.classfile.Method method,
                                            org.apache.bcel.generic.InstructionHandle ih,
                                            int listLength,
                                            int insNumber,
                                            java.lang.String methodName,
                                            java.lang.String className,
                                            java.lang.String methArgs)
        Take a bytecode instruction in a given context and translate it to a horn clause representation. Note : ins and ih must be related to the same instruction. similar bytecode instructions are grouped in a same class representation because they need similar treatment.
        Parameters:
        ins - representation of the bytecode instruction (Instruction class).
        method - representation of the method that contains the given instruction.
        ih - representation of the bytecode instruction with more information about context (InstructionHandle class).
        listLength - The position(number) of the last instruction of the method.
        className - Name of the class
        insNumber - Instruction number
        methodName - Name of the method

      • translateList

        public static java.lang.String translateList(org.apache.bcel.generic.InstructionList instList,
                                             org.apache.bcel.classfile.Method method,
                                             java.lang.String className)
        Translate a java method stack based representation to an horn clauses register based representation.
        Parameters:
        instList - list of instructions contained in method
        method - method that contains instList
        className - Name of the class

      • translatePattern

        public static java.lang.String translatePattern(int patternNumber,
                                                int instNumber,
                                                org.apache.bcel.generic.InstructionHandle[] instList,
                                                java.lang.String className,
                                                org.apache.bcel.classfile.Method method)
